I have to say, this game is old but it still stands to this day.
Half-Life was an adventure of it's own, I cannot believe how some people think this game is bad. The story rich game has different paths to execute. You can either complete the game not killing any good NPCs or either you can kill everyone you see. This will reward you in different ways.
The sound design is amazing, going to different areas gives a new soundtrack. The soundtrack fits with all the areas and the soundtrack is still one of the best.

The newer release of Half-Life source is okay but not as good as this release. Half-Life will always stand as the best Half-Life game.

Buy this game if you haven't already, you will not regret anything about it.
